item.title: Trump backed down from NATO tariffs over Greenland but may cross a 'red line' on U.S. military bases there - Fortune
item.description: Trump backed down from NATO tariffs over Greenland but may cross a ‘red line’ on U.S. military bases there FortuneAnalysis | Trump’s sudden retreat on Greenland shows that limits still exist The Washington PostUS stocks recover half of the prior day’s plunge after Trump calls off Greenland-related tariffs AP NewsOpinion | Man Bites Davos The New York TimesOpinion | Donald Trump, Not Unchained The Wall Street Journal
